global.title: 'Sentinel-2 data served by rasdaman'
global.originator: Wageningen University and Research (WUR) - 6708 PB Wageningen, Netherlands
global.description: Preprocessed crop parcel data (rasterized version of Dutch LPIS ‘basisregistratie percelen’ (BRP) vector data) over a Dutch study area for a semantic segmentation example.
global.project_purpose: This data is part of a deep learning example to demonstrate how semantic segmentation works and to see how the functionality can be integrated in Rasdaman.
global.data_standards: The encoded crop classes represent crop types from the official list maintained by the Dutch government (RVO).
global.crop_class: Unique crop classes, encoded as integer values [1,76]; UInt16; dimensionless.

bands.name: Band_1
bands.description: Integer encoded crop class, representing the crop grown on the farm parcel (in 2018).
